item.title: Stir
item.description: You speak to me In such soft Visions. Slowly Forming Spines Splining from the light Here. Within. Fire in my eyes. I know Youâ€™re here. Storm in my ears. Peace. Sacred land. I dance on You. Screaming. Rapture. Ashes burned on The corners of my bones. Embracing Subtle wonders. Placing sacrifice. Enraging demons from Afar.
